name: Paid In China
overview:
Paid In China is a China focused B2B Marketplace aiming to optimise online procurement for SMEs and traders around the world. China’s ongoing evolution from an ultra cheap manufacturing base to one that is both dynamic and complex presents globally significant challenges. Among them are the following:

-Child labour -Counterfeit -Quality defects -Environmental pollution -Health and safety

Incumbents are either overlooking some of the above or not doing enough to:

  1. Ensure that credible Chinese manufacturers and enterprises rise to the top of the food chain by standing out from unethical ones.

  2. Ensure that global SMEs and traders participate in fully credible trade while benefiting from the economies of scale China avails.

  3. Reward both buyers and sellers for prioritising credible trade with regards to mitigating risks the planet is facing through global warming and other sustainability challenges (as listed above).

Paid In China seeks to become a niche player in China’s $520 Billion B2B marketplace sector by directly addressing the above issues. We are doing so through linkages that empower the world’s SMEs, traders and credible Chinese enterprises.

More jobs, more (credible) trade and more opportunities can transform the lives of millions of people both in China and around the world.
